entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Gore Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:34 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gore Bay-Manitoulin Airport 03:18 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -0.6°C
Pressure: 101.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -4.5°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few rain showers or periods of drizzle ending early this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
